item.title: 2. Smith Graph & RF Network
item.description:
Representation of Reflect Coefficient on Complex Plane

反射系数的表示

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \Gamma(x’) &= | \Gamma_L| e^{j ( \phi_L - 2 \beta x’)} \\ &= \Gamma_r + j \Gamma_i \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

等反射系数圆

  • Smith Graph 的半径是$|\Gamma_L|$, 因此同一个也就是等反射系数圆

  • 半径为1的圆是单位反射圆

电刻度圆

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \phi &= \phi_L - 2 \beta x’ \\ &= \phi_L - \frac{ 4 \pi }{ \lambda } x' \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  • 转一圈对应$x’ = \dfrac{ \lambda }{ 2 }$, 因为$\Gamma_L$是周期为$\dfrac{ \lambda }{2}$的函数

Smith Chart

Normalized Impedance

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Z_{in} (x’) &= \frac{ Z_{in}(x’) }{ Z_0 } \\ &= Z_0 \frac{ 1 + \Gamma(x’) }{ 1 - \Gamma(x’) } \\ &= \frac{ 1 - \Gamma_r^2 - \Gamma_i^2 }{ (1 - \Gamma_r)^2 + \Gamma_i^2 } + j \frac{ 2 \Gamma_i }{ (1 - \Gamma_r)^2 + \Gamma_i^2} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} R &= \frac{ 1 - \Gamma_r^2 - \Gamma_i^2 }{ (1 - \Gamma_r)^2 + \Gamma_i^2 } \\ X &= \frac{ 2 \Gamma_i }{ (1 - \Gamma_r)^2 + \Gamma_i^2} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

等电阻圆 & 等电抗圆

  • 根据方程4可以得出等电阻圆和等电抗圆

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} (\Gamma_r - \frac{ r }{ 1 + r })^2 + \Gamma_i^2 &= ( \frac{ 1 }{ 1 + r })^2 \\ ( \Gamma_r - 1)^2 + ( \Gamma_i - \frac{ 1 }{ X }) &= (\frac{ 1 }{ X })^2 \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Category Concept
等电阻圆 圆心在实轴上，半径为$\dfrac{ 1 }{ r }$
等电抗圆 圆心在$\Gamma_r = 1$上，半径为$\dfrac{ 1 }{ X }$

RF Network

Even/Odd Mode

Introduction

项目 Even Mode Odd Mode
电流 $I_1 = I_2$ $I_1 = - I_2$
$\varepsilon_{re}$ 更大 更小
驱动 共模驱动 差分驱动
  • 最终的参数应该是$\dfrac{ Z_e + Z_o }{ 2 }$

Impedance

名称 概念
$Z_{diff}$ 差分信号沿着差分对传播时受到的阻抗，是每条信号线与返回路径之间阻抗之和。
$Z_{common}$ 共模信号沿传输线传播时收到的阻抗。共模信号是两条信号线的电压平均值，纯共模信号就是差分信号为0时的信号。

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Z_{diff} &= \begin{cases} 2 Z_0 & C = 0 \\ 2 Z_o & C \neq 0 \end{cases} \\ Z_{common} &= \frac{ 1}{ 2 } Z_e \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  • 若$Z_0 = 50 \Omega$，那么$Z_0$的Even/Odd部分分别为

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Z_{0o} &= 50 \\ Z_{0e} &= 50 \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Voltage Component

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} V_o &= V_{diff} = V_1 - V_2 \\ V_e &= V_{common} = \frac{ V_1 + V_2 }{ 2 } \\ V_1 &= V_e + \frac{ V_o }{ 2 } \\ V_2 &= V_e - \frac{ V_o }{ 2 } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

2-Ports Network

Low Frequency

Impedance & Admittace Parameters

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [V] &= [Z] [i] \\ [I] &= [Y] [V] \\ [V] &= \begin{bmatrix} V_1 \ V_2 \end{bmatrix} \\ [Z] &= \begin{bmatrix} Z_{11} & Z_{12} \\ Z_{21} & Z_{22} \end{bmatrix} \\ [i] &= \begin{bmatrix} i_1 \ i_2 \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Z_{mn} &= \begin{cases} \dfrac{ V_m }{ i_m }|{i_n = 0} & n = m\\ \dfrac{ V_m }{ i_n }|{i_m = 0} & n \neq m \end{cases} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Hybrid & Transfer Parameters

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \begin{bmatrix} v_1\\ i_2 \end{bmatrix} &= \begin{bmatrix} h_{11} & h_{12}\\ h_{21} & h_{22} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} i_1\\ v_2 \end{bmatrix} \\ \begin{bmatrix} v_1\\ i_1 \end{bmatrix} &= \begin{bmatrix} A & B\\ C & D \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} v_2\\ -i_2 \end{bmatrix} \\ [ABCD] &= \begin{bmatrix} A & B\\ C & D \end{bmatrix} \\ &= \begin{bmatrix} \dfrac{ v_1 }{ v_2 } & - \dfrac{ v_1 }{ i_2 }\\ \dfrac{ i_1 }{ v_2 } & - \dfrac{ i_1 }{ i_2 } \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Transfer Matrix

  1. 串联阻抗$Z$的二端口网络

名称 概念
$v_2 = 0$ $i_1 = -i_2 = \dfrac{ v_1 }{ Z }$
$i_2 = 0$ $i_1 = -i_2 = 0, v_1 = v_2$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [ABCD] &= \begin{bmatrix} 1 & Z\\ 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  1. 并联导纳$Y$的二端口网络

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [ABCD] &= \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0\\ Y & 1 \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

T型网络

  • 可以看成串联阻抗和并联导纳的Cascade

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [ABCD] &= \begin{bmatrix} 1 + \dfrac{ Z_A }{ Z_C } & Z_A + Z_B + \dfrac{ Z_A Z_B }{ Z_C }\\ \dfrac{ 1 }{ Z_C } & 1 + \dfrac{ Z_B }{ Z_C } \end{bmatrix} \\ &= \begin{bmatrix} 1 & Z_A \\ 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0\\ \dfrac{ 1 }{ Z_C } & 1 \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} 1 & Z_B\\ 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$\pi$型网络

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [ABCD] &= \begin{bmatrix} 1 + \dfrac{ Y_B }{ Y_C } & \dfrac{ 1 }{ Y_C }\\ Y_A + Y_B + \dfrac{ Y_A Y_B }{ Y_C } & 1 + \dfrac{ Y_A }{ Y_C } \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Uniform Transmission Line

  • 包含了$\dfrac{ \lambda }{ 4 }, \dfrac{ \lambda }{ 2 }$传输线的$T$矩阵

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [ABCD] &= \begin{cases} \begin{bmatrix} cos( \beta l) & jZ_0 sin( \beta l)\\ j \dfrac{ 1 }{ Z_0 } sin( \beta l) & cos( \beta l) \end{bmatrix} & General \\ \begin{bmatrix} 0 & j Z_0 \\ \dfrac{ j }{ Z_0 } & 0 & \theta = \dfrac{ \lambda }{ 4 } \end{bmatrix} & \theta = \dfrac{ \lambda }{ 4 } \\ \begin{bmatrix} -1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{bmatrix} & \theta = \dfrac{ \lambda }{ 2 } \end{cases} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

High Frequency

Scattered Parameter

  1. Normalized Parameter

  • Normalized Voltage

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} a_1 &= \frac{ V_1^+ }{ \sqrt{ Z_{01} } } \\ b_1 &= \frac{ V_1^- }{ \sqrt{ Z_{01} } } \\ a_2 &= \frac{ V_2^+ }{ \sqrt{ Z_{02} } } \\ b_2 &= \frac{ V_2^- }{ \sqrt{ Z_{02} } } \\ \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  • Normalized Power

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} P(x’) &= \frac{ |V^+(x’)|^2 }{ 2Z_0 } \Big[ 1 - | \Gamma(x’)|^2 \Big] = P^+(x’) - P^-(x’) \\ P_1 &= \frac{ 1 }{ 2 } ( |a_1|^2 - |b_1|^2 ) \\ P_2 &= \frac{ 1 }{ 2 } ( |a_2|^2 - |b_2|^2 ) \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

S Parameter

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [b] &= [S] [a] \\ [S] &= \begin{bmatrix} S_{11} & S_{12}\\ S_{21} & S_{22} \end{bmatrix} \\ &= \begin{bmatrix} \dfrac{ b_1 }{ a_1 }|{a_2 = 0} & \dfrac{ b_1 }{ a_2 }|{a_1 = 0} \\ \dfrac{ b_2 }{ a_1 }|{a_2 =0} & \dfrac{ b_2 }{ a_2 }|{a_1 = 0} \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

4-Ports Network

Schematic

名称 概念
$P_1$ Input Power $P_{in}$
$P_2$ Forward Power $P_f$
$P_3$ Reflected Power $P_r$
$P_4$ Coupled Power $P_c$

Factors

名称 概念
Coupling Factor $C = 10 \cdot lg( \dfrac{ P_i }{ P_c })$
Directivity $D = 10 \cdot lg( \dfrac{ P_f }{ P_r})$
Isolation $I = 10 \cdot lg( \dfrac{ P_i }{ P_r })$，隔离输入与反射，输出与耦合

S Parameter Analysis In Idealized Case

  1. Idealized Case
名称 概念
4 Ports are Matched $S_{11} = S_{22} = S_{33} = S_{44} = 0$
It follows the property of symmetry $S_{ij} = S_{ji}$
1 & 3, 2 & 4 are isolated $S_{13} = S_{31} = S_{24} = S_{42} = 0$
Equal Forward Power $S_{12} = S_{34} = P$
Equal Coupled Power $S_{14} = S_{23} = Q$
Lossless $[S] \cdot [S]^* = I$
对应端口阻抗相同 $Z_{ij} = Z_{ji}$
  1. S Matrix

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} [S] &= \begin{bmatrix} 0 & P & 0 & Q \\ P & 0 & Q & 0 \\ 0 & Q & 0 & P \\ Q & 0 & P & 0 \end{bmatrix} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \because [S] \cdot [S]^* &= I \\ \therefore P^2 + Q^2 &= 1 \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Appendix

电抗

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} X_C &= -\frac{ 1 }{ \omega C } \\ X_L &= \omega L \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Q值

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Q &= \frac{ E_{store} }{ E_{loss} } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  • 越高，表示品质越好

Appendix

人工传输线

  • 传输特性：人工传输线具有特定的传输特性，如传输速度、带宽、传输损耗、传输延迟和噪声等。这些特性直接影响信号的传输质量和可靠性。

  • 阻抗匹配：为了最大限度地减少信号反射和传输损耗，人工传输线需要与连接的设备之间的阻抗进行匹配。阻抗不匹配会导致信号反射和信号失真。

  • 传输模式：人工传输线可以支持不同的传输模式，如单端传输和差分传输。差分传输常用于抑制噪声和提高信号抗干扰能力。

  • 传输介质：人工传输线可以采用不同的传输介质，包括金属导线（如铜线）、光纤和空气介质等。每种介质都有其特定的传输特性和应用领域。

  • 传输线理论：人工传输线的行为可以通过传输线理论进行建模和分析。传输线理论考虑了电磁波在传输线上的传播、反射、折射和衰减等现象，以帮助设计和优化传输线的性能。

item.title: 3. Coupler
item.description:
Coupler and Its Quality

和S参数、工作频率的关系

Category Concept
参数 对S参数的影响
耦合间隙 间隙越小,耦合越强, $S_{31}$越大
耦合器臂长度 影响相位,从而影响S参数的幅度
耦合器臂宽度 $R = \dfrac{ \pho l }{ S }$, 与特征阻抗成反比，影响阻抗匹配和正反向传输系数($S_{11}, S_{22}, S_{21}, S_{12}$), 因为太窄电流损失会很大
耦合器臂形状 影响电磁场分布,从而影响耦合强度和S参数
交叉臂长度 长的交叉臂自感和互感较大，$\omega = \dfrac{ 1 }{ LC }$, 所以工作频率会降低, 在$0.1 \lambda - 0.25 \lambda$之间最好
增加环绕结构 更多电容电感，增加$S_{31}$, 工作频率会小幅降低
不同金属层之间的耦合 效果更好, 宽带更大
耦合器厚度 厚度越小，耦合系数越大

S参数的优劣评价

Category Concept
$S_{11}$ 如果$S_{11}$幅度较大(低于$-10dB$),表示输入阻抗偏离$50 \Omega$,匹配程度差。
传输$S_{21}$ $3dB$以下表示效果较好
耦合$S_{31}$ 看设计要求
隔离$S_{41}$ 在$-20dB$以下为好

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Z_{in} &= Z_0 \frac{ 1 + S_{11} }{ 1 - S_{11} }\\ Z_0 &= 50 \Omega \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

电长度和频率

$\lambda$ Frequency($GHz$)
1cm $28GHz$
3cm $10GHz$
6cm $5GHz$
12.5cm $2.4GHz$

90度相位差的实现

  1. 利用传输线的电长度差异。例如branch-line Coupler,通过四分之一个波长的电长度差,可以实现90度相位差。

  2. 利用环形和直形传输线的电长度和耦合因子差异。例如环形杂散耦合器和桥式耦合器。

  3. 在筛选器和耦合器的结构中引入交叉耦合。交叉耦合等效于在两个路径中引入了90度相移。

  4. 在微带线路中,利用偶极子和零偶极子模式的耦合,可以产生90度相位差。

  5. 在射频集成电路中,可以利用RC杂散网络实现各种相位差。

item.title: 1. Transmission Line
item.description:
Basic Concepts

频谱划分 & 无线通信系统的工作频率

Radio Frequency & Microwave

比较

分类 Radio Frequency Microwave
频率 $30MHz - 100GHz+$ $300MHz - 3000GHz$
优点 速度快，频率高，带宽大，尺寸小
缺点 成本高，功率小，辐射损耗大

定义

  • 电路尺寸和波长可以想比拟时，称为射频电路

特点

Distributed Parameters

Skin Effect

  1. Skin Effect

电流高度集中在导体表面，增加电阻

Category Concept
$\mu$ 磁导率
$\rho$ 电阻率
$\sigma = \dfrac{ 1 }{ \rho }$ 电导率
  1. Skin Depth

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \delta &= \frac{ 1 }{ \sqrt{ \pi f \mu \sigma } } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  1. Radio Frequency Resistance
  • 以半径为$a$, 长为$l$的圆柱形导体为例

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} R_{DC} &= \frac{ l }{ \pi a^2 \sigma} \\ R_{RF} &= \frac{ a }{ 2 \delta } R_{DC} \\ &= \frac{ \sqrt{ \pi f \mu/ \sigma} l}{ 2 \pi a} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Transmission Line Structure

Basic Concepts

名称 概念
Wavelength $\lambda = \dfrac{ c }{ \sqrt{ \varepsilon_r} f_0 }$
Electric Length $G= \dfrac{ l}{ \lambda } = \dfrac{ lf }{ v_p }$
Phase Velocity $v_p = f \lambda = \dfrac{ \omega }{ \beta } = \dfrac{ c }{ \sqrt{\varepsilon_r \mu_r }}, f = \sqrt{ \varepsilon_r} f_0$
Phase Shift $\phi = 2 \pi \dfrac{ l }{ \lambda }$
Normalized Frequency $f_N =$
常见频率波长转换 $2.4GHz \longleftrightarrow \lambda= 12.5cm \ 5GHz \longleftrightarrow \lambda = 6cm \ 10GHz \longleftrightarrow \lambda = 3cm$

构成与分类

电性能分类

Category Concept
TEM(横电磁波) 电/磁场都与传播方向垂直
TE 电场与传播方向垂直
TM 磁场与传播方向垂直

带状线/微带线

Transmission Line Function

Telegrapher’s Equation

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \frac{ \partial V(x,t) }{ \partial x } = - (R + j \omega L) I(x) \\ \frac{ \partial I(x,t) }{ \partial x } = - (G + j \omega C) V(x) \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Wave Equation for a homogeneous Transmission Line

Wave Equation

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} 0 &= \frac{ \partial^2 V }{ \partial x^2 } - \gamma^2 V \\ 0 &= \frac{ \partial^2 I }{ \partial x^2 } - \gamma^2 I \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Transmission Constant

  • 当$L,C, \omega \neq 0$时

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \gamma &= \sqrt{ (R + j \omega L)(G + j \omega C) } = \alpha + j \beta \\ \mathbb { Re } ( \gamma) &= \alpha = (a^2 + b^2)^{1/4} cos( \phi) \\ \mathbb { Im }( \gamma) &= \beta = (a^2 + b^2)^{1/4}sin( \phi) \\ a &= RG - \omega^2 LC = \omega^2 LC \Big[ ( \frac{ R }{ \omega L}) ( \frac{ G }{ \omega C }) - 1) \Big] \\ b &= \omega C R + \omega L G = \omega^2 LC ( \frac{ R }{ \omega L } + \frac{ G }{ \omega C }) \\ \phi &= tan^{-1}( \frac{ b }{ a }) \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Solution in General Case

  1. In General Case

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} V(x) &= A_1 e^{- \gamma x} + A_2 e^{ \gamma x} \\ I(x) &= \frac{ 1 }{ Z_0 }(A_1 e^{- \gamma x} - A_2 e^{ \gamma x}) \\ Z_0 &= \sqrt{ \dfrac{ R + j \omega L }{ G + j \omega C } } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  1. in Idealized Case
  • $R, G = 0$, 通常都认为是无损耗线

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} V(x) &= A_1 e^{- j \beta x} +A_2 e^{j \beta x} \\ I(x) &= \frac{ 1 }{ Z_0 } (A_1 e^{- j \beta x} - A_2 e^{j \beta x}) \\ Z_0 &= \sqrt{ \dfrac{ L }{ C } } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Incident & Reflected Traveling Wave

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} v(x,t) &= \mathbb{ Re } \Big\lbrace v(x) e^{j \omega t} \Big\rbrace \\ &= \mathbb { Re } \Big\lbrace A_1 e^{j( \omega t - \beta x) } + A_2 e^{j ( \omega t + \beta x)} \Big\rbrace \\ &= A_1 cos( \omega t - \beta x) + A_2 cos ( \omega t + \beta x) \\ &= A_1 cos[ \beta( \frac{ \omega }{ \beta }t - x )] + A_2 cos[ \beta( \frac{ \omega }{ \beta }t + x )] \\ &= A_1 cos[ \beta(x -v_p t)]+ A_2 cos [ \beta(x + v_p t)] \\ I(x,t) &= \frac{ 1 }{ Z_0 } \Big\lbrace A_1 cos[ \beta(x -v_p t)] - A_2 cos [ \beta(x + v_p t)] \Big\rbrace \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  • $v(x,t)$和$i(x,t)$都是入射行波和反射行波的线性叠加

Reflect Coefficient

定义

  • 反射电压/入射电压

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \Gamma(x’) &= \frac{ V^-(x’) }{ V^+(x’) } = - \frac{ I^-(x’) }{ I^+(x’) } \\ &= \Gamma_L e^{-j 2 \beta x’} \\ &= | \Gamma_L | e^{ j (\phi_L - 2 \beta x’)} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \Gamma_L &= \frac{ V_2^- }{ V_2^+ } \\ &= \frac{ V_2 - I_2 Z_0 }{ V_2 + I_2 Z_0 } \\ &= \frac{ Z_L - Z_0 }{ Z_L + Z_0 } \\ &= | \Gamma_L | e^{j \phi L} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

结论

  1. 无损耗均匀传输线上任一点反射波与入射波振幅之比为常数

  2. $\Gamma(x’)$的周期为$\dfrac{ \lambda }{ 2 }$

VSWR (Voltage Standing Wave Ratio)

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} VSWR &= \rho = \frac{ |V_{max}| }{|V_{min}|} \\ &= \frac{ 1 + | \Gamma_L | }{ 1 - | \Gamma_L | } \\ K &= \frac{ 1 }{ \rho } = \frac{ |V_{min} |}{|V_{max}|} \\ &= \frac{ 1 - | \Gamma_L | }{ 1 + | \Gamma_L | } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Category Concept
$|\Gamma_L| = 0$ 行波状态，$Z_L = Z_0 = Z_{in}$, 阻抗匹配, $\rho = 1, K = 1$, 各个点的电压/电流同幅同相
$|\Gamma_L| = 1$ 驻波状态, $\rho = \infin, K = 0$
$0 <|\Gamma_L| < 1$ 行驻波状态, $1 < \rho < \infin ,1 < K < \infin$

Input Impedance

任意一点的电压$V(x)$与电流$I(x)$值之比

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Z_{in}(x’) &= \frac{ V(x’) }{ I(x’) } \\ &= Z_0 \dfrac{ Z_L + j Z_0 tan (\beta x’) }{ Z_0 + j Z_L tan( \beta x’)} \\ &= Z_0 \frac{ 1 + \Gamma(x’) }{ 1 - \Gamma(x’) } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} Z_L &= Z_0 \frac{ 1 + \Gamma_L }{1 0 \Gamma_L } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  • 当$Z_L = Z_0$时, $Z_{in} = Z_0$

Transmission Power

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} P(x’) &= \frac{ 1 }{ 2 } Re \Big\lbrace V(x) I^*(x) \Big\rbrace \\ &= \frac{ |V^+(x’)|^2 }{2 Z_0} 2 Z_0 \Big[ 1 - | \Gamma(x’)|^2 \Big] \\ &= \frac{ | V^+(x’) |^2 }{ 2 Z_0 } - \frac{ |V^-(x’)|^2 }{ 2 Z_0} \\ &= P^+(x’) - P^-(x’) \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

  • 传输功率 = 入射功率 - 反射功率

Transmission Line With Load and Signal Source

4 Reflected Coefficient

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} \Gamma_{in} &= \frac{ Z_{in} - Z_0 }{ Z_{in} + Z_0} = \Gamma_L e^{-j 2 \beta l} \\ \Gamma_{S} &= \frac{ Z_S - Z_0 }{ Z_S + Z_0 } \\ \Gamma_{out} &= \Gamma_S e^{-j 2 \beta l} \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Transmission Coefficient

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} T_{in} &= 1 + \Gamma_{in} = \frac{ 2 Z_{in} }{ Z_{in} + Z_0 } \\ T_L &= 1 + \Gamma_L = \frac{ 2 Z_L }{ Z_L + Z_0 } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Power of Transmission Line

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} V_{in} &= V_{in}^+ + V_{in}^- \\ &= V_{in}^+ ( 1 + \Gamma_{in}) \\ &= V_S \frac{ Z_S }{ Z_{in} + Z_S } \\ V_{in}^+ &= \frac{ V_S }{ 2 } \frac{ 1 - \Gamma_S }{ 1 - \Gamma_S \Gamma_{in} } \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} P_{in} &= \frac{ |V_{in}|^2 }{ 2 Z_0 } \Big[ 1 - | \Gamma_{in} |^2 \Big] \\ &= \frac{ |V_S|^2 }{ 8 Z_0 } \frac{ | 1 - \Gamma_S|^2 }{ |1 - \Gamma_S \Gamma_{in} |^2} ( 1 - | \Gamma_{in}|^2 ) \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

Conjuction Match & Losses

Conjuction Match of Signal Source

$$ \begin{aligned} P_{in} &= \frac{ 1 }{ 2 } R_{in} I \cdot I^* \\ &= \frac{ 1 }{ 2 } R_{in} \frac{ V_S^2 }{ (R_S + R_{in})^2 + (X_{in} + X_S)^2 } \\ When \ X_{in} &= - X_S \\ P_{in \ max} &= \frac{ R_{in} V_S^2 }{ 2 (R_S + R_{in})^2 } \\ \frac{ \partial P_{in} }{ \partial R_{in} } &= \frac{ V_S^2 }{ 2 } \frac{ R_S - R_{in} }{ (R_S + R_{in})^3 } \\ hen \ R_S &= R_{in} \\ P_{in} &= \frac{ V_S^2 }{ 8 R_S } \end{aligned} $$

  • 所以信号换功率输出最大的条件为$Z_{in} = Z_S^*$

Return Loss & Insertion Loss

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} RL &= - 10 lg \Big( \frac{P_{in}^- }{ P_{in}^+ } \Big) \\ &= -10 lg | \Gamma_{in} |^2 \\ &= -20 lg | \Gamma_{in} | dB \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$

$$ \begin{gather} \begin{aligned} IL &= -10 lg \Big( \frac{ P_{in}^+ - P_{in}^- }{ P_{in}^+ } \Big) \\ &= -10 lg ( 1 - |\Gamma_{in}|^2 ) dB \end{aligned} \end{gather} $$
